title: Fuck Riot starting new accounts at low gold/high silver MMR for placements

replies.body:
AFAIK, they start new players with an initial MMR of approximately Silver 4.

They don't start in High Silver/Low Gold.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ykxNk2bB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-21T20:09:20.089+0000)
>
> AFAIK, they start new players with an initial MMR of approximately Silver 4.
> 
> They don't start in High Silver/Low Gold.

Really??? Why did my buddy who just played his first ranked game ever play in a game with all gold 5/silver 1 players?? Every one of those players really have S4 mmr?

Starting mmr is 1500 for new accounts, been stated
You can be at gold 5/silver 1 and still have silver 5 mmr. MMR and elo rating are different things.
I remember playing placements, I think it was S6 dynamic with friends and we had 1 gold and 1 silver maybe vs golds and needless to say we got smashed

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ykxNk2bB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-21T20:09:20.089+0000)

> AFAIK, they start new players with an initial MMR of approximately Silver 4.
> 
> They don't start in High Silver/Low Gold.

3 wins and you're in gold MMR range if you got lucky and always win against a higher MMR aggregate trio of teams. Such is the nature of bonus MMR.

But yeah, still 1200ish starting point.
Well u started there too. Is it Riots fault u are still on new player MMR?
